name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TmFeedScraper | Scrape Reviews Data to CSV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to extract item reviews or shop reviews into CSV. Export comments, ratings, variations, images, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One click to extract item reviews or shop reviews into CSV. Export comments, ratings, variations, images, and more.

# Features

- Extract reviews from item, including content, ratings, images, etc.
- Provide support for sorting by "Recommended", "Most recent", "Highest rating" and "Lowest rating".
- Provide support exporting reviews for item and shop.
- Allow direct export of review listings to CSV files.

# How to use?

- Open any item detail page.
- Click on this Chrome extension app.
- Click the "Download Reviews" button located next to the review count to initiate the retrieval of reviews.
- Allow the process to finish, and the data will be automatically downloaded in a CSV file.

# **Is it Free?**

Indeed, TM Reviews Extractor is available for free. You can access the basic features and choose to upgrade for more functionalities.

# **Data Privacy**

All data processing occurs locally on your computer, and it never traverses our servers.
